translation.en: Even more blackface.

translation.en: Apparently this is a thing that white children are into.

translation.en: - - ...than meets the eye.
translation.ja: 複雑な意図が

translation.en: Oh, more actual Black people. I wonder if they'll find this amusing.
translation.ja: 本物の黒人のお出ましだ 彼らも楽しめるかな？

translation.en: - How dare you? - This is bullshit.
translation.ja: 何してるのよ

translation.en: - What the hell is this? - You are not Beyoncé.
translation.ja: ふざけるな ビヨンセ気取り？
ビヨンセ気取り？

translation.en: They do not.
translation.ja: 無理なようだ

translation.en: Everyone back in the house right now! Drinks down!
translation.ja: 全員 今すぐ中に戻れ

translation.en: Unpacking this egregious event will take some time,
translation.ja: 騒動の最中ではあるが 物語の主人公を紹介しよう

translation.en: but an excellent place to begin our saga is with Samantha White,
translation.ja: 騒動の最中ではあるが 物語の主人公を紹介しよう サマンサ･ホワイト

translation.en: a junior media studies major and local provocateur.
translation.ja: メディア学部で 黒人グループの中心人物

translation.en: Slavery in America.
translation.ja: アメリカ奴隷制について

translation.en: Anybody like to volunteer to lead the discussion?
translation.ja: 討論を主導してくれる者は？

translation.en: As one of the few Black faces in this mostly white place...
translation.ja: 白人ばかりの学内で 黒人は少数派

translation.en: - Anyone? - ...Sam had become
translation.ja: 誰か？ こんな時は注目の的だ

translation.en: used to episodes like this...
translation.ja: こんな時は注目の的だ

translation.en: Anyone with some special connection to the material?
translation.ja: この題材に うってつけの人はいないかな

translation.en: ...and run- ins like these.
translation.ja: こんな言葉も慣れっこだ

translation.en: You look like Beyoncé.
translation.ja: ビヨンセ似だ

translation.en: Storm from the X- Men.
translation.ja: ＸーＭＥＮのストーム

translation.en: Wait, what are you?
translation.ja: あなたって なに人？

translation.en: Sam had enough and took to Winchester's syndicated student radio station.
translation.ja: 辟易(へきえき)した彼女は 大学のラジオ局で語る

translation.en: Dear white people, here's a little tip.
translation.ja: 親愛なる白人様に一言

translation.en: When you ask someone who looks ethnically different, What are you?
translation.ja: 人種の違う相手に なに人かと聞くけど

translation.en: the answer is usually, A person about to slap the shit out of you.
translation.ja: 答えは“あんたを ひっぱたく人”よ

translation.en: While Sam's show, aptly titled Dear White People,
translation.ja: 番組タイトルは “親愛なる白人(ディア･ホワイト･ピープル)様”

translation.en: garnered a diverse set of listeners...
translation.ja: 幅広いリスナーを持つ

translation.en: Who is this chick?
translation.ja: この女 誰だ？

translation.en: ...others was butthurt.
translation.ja: 中には気分を害す人も 〝失われた ブラックカルチャー〞

translation.en: Keeping with its vow to mock anyone deemed too self- important,
translation.ja: 生意気なヤツを ディスるのが信条の集団―

translation.en: Pastiche set out to take down Samantha White by throwing a politically incorrect party
translation.ja: パスティーシュの連中は 早速サマンサ潰しにかかった

translation.en: for all those burdened by her demands for racial sensitivity.
translation.ja: 不道徳なパーティーを 企画したのだ 〝失われた 言論の自由〞

translation.en: However, after pressure from the administration,
translation.ja: しかし 大学側が 許すはずもなく―

translation.en: - the party was canceled. -
translation.ja: 中止を余儀なくされた

translation.en: But somehow, unbeknownst to Pastiche,
translation.ja: だが なぜか 彼らの知らないうちに

translation.en: an invite went out anyway.
translation.ja: 招待状は発送されていた

translation.en: And it is here we find Sam and her camera,
translation.ja: そして大学最大の不祥事が

translation.en: at the epicenter of one of the biggest scandals to hit Winchester so far.
translation.ja: サマンサのカメラに 収められることになる

translation.en: And like most parties, the hangover from this one...
translation.ja: 多くのパーティー同様 翌朝の目覚めは―

translation.en: is a motherfucker.
translation.ja: 最悪だった

translation.en: Dear white people,
translation.ja: 親愛なる白人様

translation.en: here's a list of acceptable Halloween costumes:
translation.ja: ハロウィーンに仮装するなら

translation.en: a pirate, slutty nurse, any of our first 43 presidents.
translation.ja: 海賊やオバマ以外の 大統領などが差別にならない

translation.en: Top of the list of unacceptable costumes: me.
translation.ja: 絶対にＮＧな仮装は私よ

translation.en: Winchester couldn't get through 2017 without blackface?
translation.ja: 黒人に扮装するなんて 正気なの？

translation.en: Oh, I'm sorry. Am I being too loud for you?
translation.ja: ごめん　うるさかった？

translation.en: You know I stay woke, Sam, but right now, I'm getting the tea
translation.ja: お尻を大きく見せる方法を 聴いてるの

translation.en: on how to be waist thin and ass thick
translation.ja: お尻を大きく見せる方法を 聴いてるの テキサスの白人女からね

translation.en: from this white bitch in Texas.
translation.ja: テキサスの白人女からね

translation.en: Okay, one, you're gorge. And, two, is white bitch in Texas her government name?
translation.ja: 十分 ステキよ “テキサスの白人女”って？

translation.en: Her name's Marian Updike, and she's the founder of the Think Slim online course,
translation.ja: Ｍ(マリアン)･アップダイクよ オンラインで―

translation.en: and she be dropping the knowledge I need to drop my sophomore 16.
translation.ja: 「スリムになる方法」って 講座を

translation.en: - - Not a thing.
translation.ja: くだらない

translation.en: I'm learning how to enjoy a decadent McRib.
translation.ja: しっかり噛(か)めば マックリブも食べていいって 〝夏彼〞から 〝いい声だ〞

translation.en: Miss Updike told me to cut it into fourths and count my chews.
translation.ja: しっかり噛(か)めば マックリブも食べていいって

translation.en: Thirty, by the way.
translation.ja: 30回噛めばね

translation.en: I can't with you, and what's more, I won't.
translation.ja: どうかしら　興味ないわ

translation.en: - - Look. For those of you who thought our ivory tower was immune to this type of shit...
translation.ja: この放送には影響されないと 思ってる人たちに贈るわ

translation.en: Okay, I'm pretty sure the McRib was invented by Republicans in the '80s to destroy Black communities,
translation.ja: マックリブは80年代に 共和党が黒人団体を潰すため

translation.en: along with crack and Jerry Springer.
translation.ja: 考案したと

translation.en: Suck it, Reagan. I'm still here. And please know that I will be showing up on McRib day

translation.en: in a Shirley Chisholm T- shirt sans internal conflict.
translation.ja: Ｓ(シャーリー)･チザムの Ｔシャツを着てね

translation.en: Is McRib day a thing? Where are you getting these Shirley Chisholm T- shirts?
translation.ja: いい考えだけど どこにそんなＴシャツが？

translation.en: Forever 21. Girl, you know I have no shame.
translation.ja: ファストファッションの店よ

translation.en: - Well... -
translation.ja: それより 恥ずかしいこともしてる

translation.en: - Aside from my one secret shame. - Only one?
translation.ja: それより 恥ずかしいこともしてる それより 恥ずかしいこともしてる 〝今すぐ会いたい〞 〝今すぐ会いたい〞 他にも？ 〝今すぐ会いたい〞

translation.en: Sam, I've been secretly streaming The Cosby Show.
translation.ja: 〝今すぐ会いたい〞 「コスビー･ショー」を 観てる 〝今すぐ会いたい〞 「コスビー･ショー」を 観てる

translation.en: My conscience? Riddled with guilt.
translation.ja: すごい罪悪感だわ

translation.en: It's just really convenient that this all came out once white people realized he was rich enough to buy NBC.
translation.ja: 超金持ちだって分かったから 報道されたのよ

translation.en: I mean, he probably did that shit. I'm just saying.
translation.ja: スキャンダルは 本当だろうけど

translation.en: Yeah, probably.
translation.ja: そうかもね

translation.en: All right, y'all. Five minutes left for call- ins. Give me your worst.
translation.ja: 電話受け付けは あと５分で終了よ

translation.en: I find your show offensive and highly divisive.
translation.ja: 君の番組は攻撃的で 対立を生む

translation.en: We need to come together at times like this.
translation.ja: 互いに協力し合うべきだ

translation.en: Are you a white male?
translation.ja: あなた白人？

translation.en: Why? Race is a social construct.
translation.ja: 人種は関係ない

translation.en: I'll take that as a yes.
translation.ja: やっぱり白人ね

translation.en: Look, I didn't create the divide.
translation.ja: 対立する気はない 意識してほしいだけ

translation.en: I'm just calling attention to it.
translation.ja: ベシェ寮 対立する気はない 意識してほしいだけ

translation.en: Dear White People?
translation.ja: “親愛なる白人様”？

translation.en: Even you have to admit your show comes off aggressive.
translation.ja: 内容はケンカ腰のくせに

translation.en: Dear White People is a misnomer.
translation.ja: あえて皮肉ったの

translation.en: My show is meant to articulate the feelings of a misrepresented group

translation.en: outside the majority.
translation.ja: 発信する番組だから

translation.en: I get it. The realization that you contribute to a racist society can be unsettling,
translation.ja: 差別主義者には 耳の痛い話もするけど

translation.en: but you sound like a grown- ass woman to me.
translation.ja: いい大人なら 理解してほしいわ

translation.en: Next.
translation.ja: 次は誰？

translation.en: Listen, the man could take an episode about Rudy getting a B- minus
translation.ja: ルディがＢマイナスを 取ったのを―

translation.en: and stretch it into a half hour of comedic gold.
translation.ja: 面白おかしく 言いふらしてる男が

translation.en: Oh, God, I pray he didn't stretch little Rudy out in any other way.

translation.en: - Bitch, you going to hell. - I'll save you a seat.
translation.ja: 地獄に落ちるわよ 道連れにするわ

translation.en: Thanks for saying what we're all thinking.

translation.en: Sometimes, I feel like I don't belong on my own campus.
translation.ja: 大学に僕たちの居場所はない

translation.en: Right?

translation.en: They too busy patting themselves on the back for letting us in.
translation.ja: 私たちを入学させた時点で もう満足してるのよ アームストロング＝ パーカー学生寮 私たちを入学させた時点で もう満足してるのよ

translation.en: Shit would get way too real for a Monday morning.

translation.en: - Right after? - Mm- hmm.

translation.en: You're supposed to spread all this jelly, you know.

translation.en: - Ew. - It's not ew.

translation.en: It's imperative to the game. Look.

translation.en: - Come here. Okay. -

translation.en: Shit.
translation.ja: イヤだ

translation.en: Reggie's a...

translation.en: Reggie's a cool guy.

translation.en: Gabe, I know how analogies work.

translation.en: I guess what I'm saying is, you know, it's, uh...

translation.en: You want more.
translation.ja: 深い関係に

translation.ja: ライオネル･ヒギンズね

translation.en: Um, yes.

translation.en: From the Winchester Independent. Covering this meeting. I just need someone to give me the lay of the land.
translation.ja: 大学新聞の記者で 集会の取材をしたくて来た

translation.en: Sure. You did that article about breaking up the party.
translation.ja: パーティー中止の記事を 書いた人ね？

translation.en: Yeah.
translation.ja: ああ

translation.en: Why haven't we heard of you before?
translation.ja: 知らなかったわ

translation.en: I'm not that notable.
translation.ja: 僕は有名じゃない

translation.en: Something tells me that's not true.
translation.ja: そうは思えないけど

translation.en: Well, generally speaking,
translation.ja: はっきり言うけど

translation.en: Black Caucus is when the different Black student unions at Winchester get together for a completely masturbatory
translation.ja: 黒人幹部会なんて 学内の団体が馴れ合いで―

translation.en: and pointless pissing contest under the guise of unity.
translation.ja: 的外れな議論を戦わせるだけ

translation.en: Held during lunchtime at Armstrong Parker once a month because nobody wants to make room on their schedule.
translation.ja: 月に１度 時間がないから 昼休みに寮に集まる

translation.en: - And we already eat here. - Is this off the record?
translation.ja: 毎日 昼はここで食べてるが それはオフレコ？

translation.en: You can quote us all you want.
translation.ja: 好きに書いて

translation.en: We got the Black Student Union, headed by me,
translation.ja: 私が主催するＢＳＵは

translation.en: Winchester's first and only relevant group fighting for Black causes on campus.
translation.ja: 学内での差別と 本気で戦う唯一の団体よ

translation.en: We got the African- American Student Union,
translation.ja: アフリカ系アメリカ人(ＡＡ) 学生連合(ＳＵ)は―

translation.en: or AASU, which basically does nothing
translation.ja: アフリカ系アメリカ人(ＡＡ) 学生連合(ＳＵ)は― ＢＳＵの活動に 乗っかってるだけ

translation.en: and takes credit for the work of the BSU.
translation.ja: ＢＳＵの活動に 乗っかってるだけ

translation.en: They claim mac and cheese Wednesdays, but we made that shit happen. Yes.
translation.ja: マカロニチーズデーは 俺たちが始めた

translation.en: We got Black American Forum or Black AF. Mostly mediocre slam poets. They make hashtags and T- shirts.
translation.ja: 黒人フォーラム(ＡＦ)の連中は 下手な詩や＃(ハッシュタグ)ばっかり

translation.en: - And throw dope parties. - Mm- hmm.
translation.ja: イケてるパーティーも

translation.en: - And then there's-- - CORE.
translation.ja: それから… “コア(ＣＯＲＥ)”も

translation.en: The Coalition of Racial Equality.
translation.ja: 人種平等連合だ

translation.en: And the only group here invited to sit at the dean's quarterly student council.
translation.ja: 学部長が開く生徒会に 招かれる唯一のグループ

translation.en: Don't say the dean like he's not your father.
translation.ja: 学部長の息子だしね

translation.en: - Hi, Lionel. - Hi, Troy.
translation.ja: どうも トロイ

translation.en: I trust your story's portrayal of these fine groups will go unbiased.
translation.ja: 公正な記事を期待してるよ

translation.en: - You got it, Troy. -
translation.ja: もちろんだ

translation.en: Some things never change.
translation.ja: 相変わらずね

translation.en: Some things do.
translation.ja: どうかな

translation.en: Coco. CORE's new treasurer.
translation.ja: コアの財務担当 ココよ

translation.en: Real name: Colandrea.
translation.ja: 本名はコランドレア Ｃ-Ｏ…

translation.en: C- o- l- a- n- d- r- e- a.
translation.ja: 本名はコランドレア Ｃ-Ｏ… Ｌ-Ａ-Ｎ-Ｄ-Ｒ-Ｅ-Ａ だったわね

translation.en: For accuracy.
translation.ja: Ｌ-Ａ-Ｎ-Ｄ-Ｒ-Ｅ-Ａ だったわね

translation.en: Don't do it with that mess atop your head you like to pass off as natural,
translation.ja: やめてよ 人をバカにする前に 乱れた髪を何とかしたら？

translation.en: held together by bobby pins and prayer?
translation.ja: 人をバカにする前に 乱れた髪を何とかしたら？

translation.en: - Lord. - You want to go there?
translation.ja: みっともない ニセ髪のくせによく言うわ

translation.en: With half of India's GDP atop your head?
translation.ja: ニセ髪のくせによく言うわ

translation.en: - Oh. - They kinda got beef.
translation.ja: いつもこうなの

translation.en: - Picked that up. - We have nothing, sweets.
translation.ja: いつもこうなの 私はただ―

translation.en: I happen to find her viewpoints to be little more than self- serving, Blacker- than- thou propaganda.
translation.ja: 彼女の黒人至上主義的な 高慢さが気になるだけ

translation.en: Feel free to quote me, Lionel.
translation.ja: 書いていいわよ

translation.en: Yo, fam, can we cut the Love & Hip Hop auditions and get to it?
translation.ja: くだらないケンカはやめて 始めようぜ

translation.en: Post- racial my ass. Everyone said we were crying wolf, but this is our proof.
translation.ja: “人種の壁を超えた(ポスト･レイシャル)”なんて ウソだよな

translation.en: A bunch of white kids dressing up like us? I mean, this is some real shit.
translation.ja: 白人が黒人に仮装するなんて 言語道断だ

translation.en: Yeah, guys, you know what this is?
translation.ja: これは明らかな人種差別よ

translation.en: - This is racism. - What a revelation, Kelsey.
translation.ja: これは明らかな人種差別よ 言われなくても分かってる

translation.en: Somebody should write this down. Paper boy, you got that?
translation.ja: 言われなくても分かってる ちゃんと書けよ

translation.en: I thought this kind of thing only happened in the '50s or in BuzzFeed articles.
translation.ja: こんなことが 現代社会で起きるなんて

translation.en: I don't feel safe.
translation.ja: 不安になるわ

translation.en: I'd like to use this meeting
translation.ja: コアはここでの意見を 集約し―

translation.en: to cull some thoughts that CORE can actually take to the dean.
translation.ja: コアはここでの意見を 集約し― 学部長に報告する

translation.en: What the hell's the Coalish gonna do?
translation.ja: 集約して何になる

translation.en: Y'all should let the BSU take lead because we've been fighting these issues since jump.
translation.ja: ＢＳＵは問題解決のために 動いてるんだ

translation.en: We need a march on campus, fam. - #Sinchester. - Uh- huh.
translation.ja: 同士を集めて 学内でデモをするのは？

translation.en: - #BlackFarceParty. - Yeah, yeah.
translation.ja: ＃黒人差別パーティー

translation.en: - #FuckThePolice! - Uh- huh.
translation.ja: ＃警察なんかぶっ飛ばせ

translation.en: - Yeah. - That one's evergreen.
translation.ja: 斬新だろ

translation.en: Damn straight. These kids amuse themselves by wearing Black bodies as costumes,
translation.ja: 斬新だろ お前たちは騒ぎたいだけだろ 怒ってるのは俺たちだけか お前たちは騒ぎたいだけだろ 怒ってるのは俺たちだけか 〝画像に タグ付けされました〞

translation.en: and we're the only ones upset?
translation.ja: お前たちは騒ぎたいだけだろ 怒ってるのは俺たちだけか 〝画像に タグ付けされました〞

translation.en: We got to bust this campus wide open.
translation.ja: 〝画像に タグ付けされました〞 この大学をどうにかしないと 〝画像に タグ付けされました〞 この大学をどうにかしないと

translation.en: Yes, Brother Malcolm.
translation.ja: そのとおりよ

translation.en: Just to play devs, all my white friends are talking about it.
translation.ja: 白人の友達も この件には批判的よ

translation.en: - So all your friends? - Yelling at people
translation.ja: 友達？ 私たちを支持する人も いるのにデモを？

translation.en: who are already on our side using hashtags and marches?
translation.ja: 私たちを支持する人も いるのにデモを？

translation.en: Cathartic though it may be,
translation.ja: 私たちが嫌な奴らに映るわ 〝画像確認を〞 私たちが嫌な奴らに映るわ

translation.en: it just makes us look angry.
translation.ja: 私たちが嫌な奴らに映るわ

translation.en: We are angry, Kelsey.
translation.ja: 実際 怒ってる

translation.en: So the AASU proposes we do nothing.
translation.ja: だから何もするなって？

translation.en: That's not what she said.
translation.ja: そうじゃない

translation.en: Pastiche are the bad guys.
translation.ja: パスティーシュには 抗議すべきよ

translation.en: - Let's go after them. - For what?
translation.ja: パスティーシュには 抗議すべきよ パスティーシュには 抗議すべきよ 〝画像確認を〞 〝画像確認を〞 ムダだわ 〝画像確認を〞

translation.en: - Their editor is Kurt Fletcher. - Son of the president.
translation.ja: 編集長のカート･ フレッチャーは学長の息子よ

translation.en: Nothing is going to happen to him or Pastiche.
translation.ja: 編集長のカート･ フレッチャーは学長の息子よ 〝画像確認を〞 編集長のカート･ フレッチャーは学長の息子よ

translation.en: You know, in the real world, kids are getting shot by cops for being Black.
translation.ja: 黒人だというだけで 警官に撃たれる時代

translation.en: Voter rights are still being suppressed.
translation.ja: 有権者は抑圧され―

translation.en: Our criminal justice system continues to propagate a new Jim Crow.
translation.ja: 差別的な司法制度は旧態依然

translation.en: This isn't about a college magazine. This is about a movement.
translation.ja: 学内誌なんて問題じゃない 世の中を見なきゃ

translation.en: We're surrounded by the future leaders of this country, and we finally got their ear.
translation.ja: 将来のわが国を背負う人材が いるこの大学で―

translation.en: - So what do we want to say? - About what now?
translation.ja: 何を発信するかよ 何を？

translation.en: You just got tagged on this.
translation.ja: あなたの画像が

translation.en: Miss Black Power over here dating white boys.
translation.ja: 彼女が 白人と付き合ってたとはね

translation.en: So... what y'all talking 'bout?
translation.ja: みんな…　何を話してるの？

translation.en: Pussy. Bitches.
translation.ja: 女とヤったこととか

translation.en: Sam, I was saying nothing, because it is none of my business what goes on behind your sheets.
translation.ja: 僕は気にしないよ 私生活には感謝しない

translation.en: It's between your sheets, Rashid.
translation.ja: “干渉しない”だろ

translation.en: I speak five languages.
translation.ja: 僕は５カ国語を話せる

translation.en: You speak one, barely. Do not correct my English.
translation.ja: 君は英語だけだろ

translation.en: Do not correct my English.
translation.ja: “君ハ英語ダケダロ”

translation.en: Sam...
translation.ja: サマンサ

translation.en: I'm happy if you're happy. Okay?
translation.ja: あなたが幸せなら 反対はしないわ

translation.en: What?
translation.ja: 何よ

translation.en: Nothing.
translation.ja: 別に

translation.en: Talking shit behind my back?
translation.ja: 陰口を？

translation.en: You're fucking someone behind mine.
translation.ja: 陰でヤッてたくせに

translation.en: He's my TA from doc class.
translation.ja: 彼は講義の助手をしてる

translation.en: We went for drinks once over the summer, and you know there ain't shit to do over the summer.
translation.ja: 夏に一度 飲んだだけで…

translation.en: You know what?
translation.ja: もういいわ

translation.en: I'm happy for you, Sam.
translation.ja: お幸せに

translation.en: Don't do that, Jo. Not you.
translation.ja: あなたまでやめて

translation.en: I have to unpack my best friend having a secret bae.
translation.ja: 親友に裏切られた気分だわ

translation.en: Secret or white?
translation.ja: 彼が白人だから？

translation.en: Both.
translation.ja: それもある

translation.en: You know I'm biracial, so technically--
translation.ja: 私は白人と黒人のハーフで…

translation.en: Look, don't.
translation.ja: やめて

translation.en: You're not Rashida Jones biracial. You're Tracee Ellis Ross biracial. People think of you as Black.
translation.ja: 誰が見ても あなたは黒人寄りのハーフよ

translation.en: This is why I didn't say shit.
translation.ja: だから隠してた

translation.en: No, you didn't say shit because you stay talking about how we can't give up on our men.
translation.ja: 矛盾を認めたくないんでしょ

translation.en: Sam, we met in the comments section of that Medium article you wrote.
translation.ja: 自分が書いた記事を 覚えてる？

translation.en: Don't Fall in Love with Your Oppressor: A Black Girl's Guide to Love at Winchester.
translation.ja: “迫害者に恋するな 黒人女性の恋愛ガイド”

translation.en: That one got so many likes.
translation.ja: 好評だった

translation.en: What's crazy is you got guys like Reggie wanting to drink your bathwater. He's literally Dap from School Daze, but darker,
translation.ja: レジーみたいに あなたに 夢中の男がいるのに―

translation.en: and you pass him up for Mackle- less?
translation.ja: 白人を選ぶわけ？

translation.en: I thought I knew who I was. I thought I knew what I wanted,
translation.ja: 自分のことは よく分かってるつもりだった

translation.en: but when I'm with him, I don't know. I...
translation.ja: でも彼といると 何ていうか…

translation.en: It's like a respite from everything.
translation.ja: 安らぎを感じるの

translation.en: We're goofy.
translation.ja: 何も考えず―

translation.en: We reference obscure movies. We watch Game of Thrones.
translation.ja: 「ゲーム･オブ･ スローンズ」を見て…

translation.en: That shit with dragons set in the world where no one's Black except the slaves?
translation.ja: 奴隷以外は 全員 白人のドラマよ

translation.en: I've tried to break it off before, but he sends one text, and I can't help but smile all day long.
translation.ja: 彼からのメール１つで 一日中 笑顔でいられる

translation.en: You hate smiling.
translation.ja: 笑顔は嫌いと

translation.en: So this is a thing?
translation.ja: 本気なのね

translation.en: Yeah, this is a thing.
translation.ja: ええ　本気よ

translation.en: He looks like the white dude in the picture that comes with the frame.
translation.ja: ああいう顔の ３流モデルいるよね

translation.en: He does.
translation.ja: 言えてる

translation.en: Fuck.
translation.ja: イヤだ

translation.en: What you got?
translation.ja: 何か？

translation.en: It's just something I gotta handle.
translation.ja: 何でもない

translation.en: So when are we gonna meet him?
translation.ja: いつ会わせてくれる？

translation.en: She's not afraid of the truth. Why are you?
translation.ja: 彼女は真実を恐れないはず

translation.en: Miss White, please take a seat.
translation.ja: どうぞ 座って どうぞ 座って 〝学部長室〞

translation.en: So many showed.
translation.ja: お祭り騒ぎね

translation.en: Don't want to bug, but I know you forget to eat.
translation.ja: 何か食べないと

translation.en: Holy shit.
translation.ja: 何だこれは

translation.en: Is this the party?
translation.ja: 例のパーティー？

translation.en: You okay?
translation.ja: 大丈夫？

translation.en: Hate it when bae leaves?
translation.ja: “帰らないでベイビー”？

translation.en: Uh, yeah, I know. But, you know, uh, in my defense, the use of bae was purely ironic.
translation.ja: 言い訳になるけど ほんの冗談のつもりだった

translation.en: You didn't think to ask before you posted that?
translation.ja: アップする前に相談して

translation.en: Um, I'm sorry.
translation.ja: ごめん

translation.en: Are you embarrassed?
translation.ja: 君に恥をかかせたかな

translation.en: the best part of us is that it was just us.
translation.ja: 大切な２人きりの時間を―

translation.en: Now I feel like I've got the entire Black Caucus in my bedroom.
translation.ja: 幹部会の全員に見られた

translation.en: Could be kinda hot.
translation.ja: 興奮するな

translation.en: Oh, okay.
translation.ja: それは 冗談よね

translation.en: - You're joking. - I'm only a Millennial on paper.
translation.ja: それは 冗談よね ネットの投稿が 正式な交際宣言になるのか？

translation.en: I didn't realize that an Instagram post was a relationship stage to be navigated.
translation.ja: ネットの投稿が 正式な交際宣言になるのか？

translation.en: - Well, it is. - Okay.
translation.ja: なるわよ 分かった

translation.en: We can go slow.
translation.ja: 慎重になるよ

translation.en: I just want to go somewhere.
translation.ja: ただ ゆっくりとでも 先に進みたい

translation.en: Don't.
translation.ja: やめて

translation.en: I don't know what you're talking about.
translation.ja: 何を？

translation.en: Don't Gosling- eye me.
translation.ja: その目よ

translation.en: Who, this guy?
translation.ja: 目って？

translation.en: What are you doing tomorrow night?
translation.ja: 明日の夜の予定は？

translation.en: What do you got?
translation.ja: 何かある？

translation.en: What are you wearing?
translation.ja: その服 なに？ ブレイキー大学院寮 その服 なに？ ブレイキー大学院寮

translation.en: What are you talking about? We're gonna watch a TV show.
translation.ja: ブレイキー大学院寮 テレビを見るだけだろ

translation.en: Not just a TV show.
translation.ja: ブレイキー大学院寮 ブレイキー大学院寮 それだけじゃない それだけじゃない

translation.en: Defamation Wednesdays are the epicenter of Black college life.
translation.ja: 黒人学生にとって 重要な集まりなの

translation.en: Okay.
translation.ja: そうかい

translation.en: - Don't you have some Js? - Oh.
translation.ja: ジーンズは？

translation.en: Wait, are you trying to My Fair Lady me for your Black friends?
translation.ja: 君の友達に 気に入られるように？

translation.en: A little.
translation.ja: まあね

translation.en: Oh, so in this instance, you want me to appropriate your culture.
translation.ja: つまり 君たちの文化に 合わせろと

translation.en: No, I--
translation.ja: 違うわ

translation.en: - That's-- - Coming?
translation.ja: 行こう

translation.en: Oh, God. Since when do you even wear sweatpants?
translation.ja: 普段スウェットはいてた？

translation.en: I wear them all the time. You're always taking 'em off of me.
translation.ja: いつも君が脱がすだろ

translation.en: Well, shit, Sam, if I knew you liked 'em light, I woulda hollered.
translation.ja: サマンサ 白人好きなら そう言えよ

translation.en: Hey, I'm Gabe.
translation.ja: ゲイブだ

translation.en: Joelle.
translation.ja: ジョエルよ

translation.en: You listen to me, and you listen very carefully.
translation.ja: ちゃんと話を聞いて

translation.en: Yes!
translation.ja: そうよ

translation.en: Yes, coat. And the boots.
translation.ja: コートがオシャレね

translation.en: You do not own me.
translation.ja: 私はあなたの所有物じゃない

translation.en: I am not your property. You do not look.
translation.ja: 私はあなたの所有物じゃない 私を見ないで 触られるのもイヤ

translation.en: You do not touch. You do not grope.
translation.ja: 私を見ないで 触られるのもイヤ

translation.en: And you definitely do not pinch my ass at the White House Correspondents' Dinner.
translation.ja: 記者クラブの晩餐会(ばんさんかい)で お尻をつねられるのも

translation.en: - Yes! -
translation.ja: よく言った

translation.en: He's cheating.
translation.ja: 浮気してるの

translation.en: Well, you don't seem to mind any other time.
translation.ja: いつもは嫌がらないだろ

translation.en: There were cameras there.
translation.ja: カメラがあった

translation.en: Roland Martin was a mere two feet away, and we all know how he loves to blast people on Twitter.
translation.ja: ツイート好きの ジャーナリストもいたわ

translation.en: I'm still in therapy from the last time I was trending.
translation.ja: 前回の傷も癒えてないのに

translation.en: - But I'm in love with you. - You better tell him.
translation.ja: 君を愛してる

translation.en: You are the leader of the free world. You don't get to fall in love.
translation.ja: あなたは大統領よ 恋してるヒマはないはず

translation.en: And what about you?
translation.ja: 君はどうなんだ

translation.en: I'm in love with my job,
translation.ja: 仕事を愛してる

translation.en: which is to get little bitch babies like you to act like grown- ass men when the world needs them to do their job.
translation.ja: あなたみたいなクソガキを まともにする この仕事をね

translation.en: - - That's my girl.
translation.ja: さすがだわ

translation.en: 'Cause she gotta say something to him, right?
translation.ja: 言うべきことを言った

translation.en: - I mean... - Well, I've got a job for you.
translation.ja: 言うべきことを言った では仕事をやろう

translation.en: Blow me. Right here in the Oval Office. On that eagle!
translation.ja: フェラしろ　今すぐに このワシの紋章の上でな

translation.en: Oh, hell no.
translation.ja: あり得ない

translation.en: Yes, Mr. President.
translation.ja: ええ 大統領

translation.en: - No! - Oh!
translation.ja: ウソ！

translation.en: What? Are you serious?
translation.ja: 信じられない

translation.en: I pledge allegiance to your cock.
translation.ja: ペニスに忠誠を誓うわ

translation.en: - Wow. Wow. Wow. - She nasty.
translation.ja: エロすぎ

translation.en: Daddy?
translation.ja: 父さん

translation.en: - I can't. - Okay, wait, wait.
translation.ja: マジ？

translation.en: - So who is that? - That's her father.
translation.ja: あの男は誰だ？ 彼女の父親よ

translation.en: Well, actually a clone of her father who works undercover for the CIA
translation.ja: 正確にはクローンで ＣＩＡのスパイなの

translation.en: after her real father's untimely death. Provided the perfect cover.
translation.ja: 本当の父親の死後に作られた

translation.en: That's a little, uh-- that's a little far- fetched.
translation.ja: だいぶ設定に無理があるな

translation.en: Does every American show revolve around fellatio- related cliffhangers?
translation.ja: アメリカの番組は フェラのシーンで終わるの？

translation.en: Hey, it's in our Constitution.
translation.ja: 憲法で決まってるのさ

translation.en: Black lives are degraded without regard, and we in here watching TV.
translation.ja: 黒人が虐げられてるのに 俺らはテレビ鑑賞

translation.en: This is how the revolution dies.
translation.ja: こうして革命は消えていく

translation.en: Hey, I was thinking we should have a sit- in. Maybe in Bechet's dining hall?
translation.ja: ベシェ寮で 座り込みするのは どう？

translation.en: Where the white legacy kids live?
translation.ja: 白人の金持ちが住む寮？

translation.en: Exactly.
translation.ja: そうよ

translation.en: Engage the part of the student body that has the luxury of ignoring us.
translation.ja: 私たちを無視してきた連中を 巻き込むの

translation.en: Not everything we do has to be geared toward white people, Sam.
translation.ja: 白人に当てつけすればいい わけじゃない

translation.en: Hey, is this about the party?
translation.ja: パーティーのこと？

translation.en: Nah.
translation.ja: いいや

translation.en: We planning to protest the library. Too many books in that motherfucker.
translation.ja: 図書館に抗議するんだ 本が多すぎるって

translation.en: You know, in 2017, I can't believe something like this could happen.
translation.ja: あんな差別的なパーティー 信じられないよ

translation.en: Really? 'Cause I can.
translation.ja: そうか？　俺は信じられる

translation.en: I mean, it's almost like you and I attend two totally separate schools.
translation.ja: 違う学校に 通ってるみたいだな

translation.en: Hey, man, I'm just as pissed off as you are.
translation.ja: 俺だって頭にきてる

translation.en: - Not possible. - No, uh--
translation.ja: ウソだ いや そうじゃなくて つまり…

translation.en: Look, that's not what I meant.
translation.ja: いや そうじゃなくて つまり…

translation.en: Bro, just because you got a Black chick on your arm doesn't mean you get to Miley Cyrus our pain, a'ight?
translation.ja: 黒人と付き合ったからって 分かった気になるなよ

translation.en: Reggie. Chill.
translation.ja: レジー やめて

translation.en: No, no, no. No, no, look.
translation.ja: 違うんだ

translation.en: You're absolutely right. I have no idea how you feel.
translation.ja: 確かに俺に分かるわけがない

translation.en: But I want to.
translation.ja: だから知りたい

translation.en: Look, I'm Gabe.
translation.ja: よろしく

translation.en: Why are you even here?
translation.ja: 場違いなんだよ

translation.en: What are you gonna do, hit me?
translation.ja: だから殴る？

translation.en: It might surprise you,
translation.ja: 意外かもしれないが

translation.en: but I don't use my fists to solve problems.
translation.ja: 暴力で解決する人間じゃない

translation.en: Hit you? Nigga, I should hit you for thinking that I would hit you.
translation.ja: 殴るとしたら 理由は お前のそういう偏見だ

translation.en: You know what?
translation.ja: 分かった

translation.en: It's not worth it.
translation.ja: その必要はない

translation.en: Sam... I'm sorry.
translation.ja: サマンサ 悪かったな

translation.en: Everything that's going-- Sam.
translation.ja: これも全部…

translation.en: - Sam, you okay? - Turn it up.
translation.ja: これも全部… 大丈夫？

translation.en: Daddy? But I buried you on Tuesday.
translation.ja: 父さん？ 火曜に埋葬したはずよ

translation.en: Holla if you need me, girl!
translation.ja: いつでも連絡して

translation.en: Ooh, shit!
translation.ja: ウソでしょ？

translation.en: Hey, are you all right?
translation.ja: ねえ 怒ってる？

translation.en: Yeah, I'm fine. I'm sorry to embarrass you in front of all your friends.
translation.ja: 恥をかかせて悪かったな

translation.en: Oh, so you felt like the odd man out for two minutes.
translation.ja: 疎外されて さっさと帰るわけ

translation.en: Guess what. I feel like that every day on this campus.
translation.ja: 私はいつもそんな思いを

translation.en: Yes, society sucks,
translation.ja: ああ 世間はおかしい

translation.en: but I would never let my friends make you feel you didn't belong in my world.
translation.ja: でも俺が君の立場だったら 君を守る

translation.en: Oh, and don't worry. I'm gonna delete the post.
translation.ja: 画像は削除するよ

translation.en: Sam?
translation.ja: サマンサ

translation.en: Can we talk?
translation.ja: 話がある

translation.en: Wait, you hacked into Dean Fairbanks' computer? That's a thing that can happen?
translation.ja: 学部長のパソコンを ハッキングした？

translation.en: Some CS major ran a redirected shell script, analyzed the active network interface, and routed...
translation.ja: コンピューター科の学生が スクリプトの出力先を変更…

translation.en: Yes, it's a thing that can happen.
translation.ja: とにかく できたんだ

translation.en: What's this got to do with me?
translation.ja: 私と何の関係が？

translation.en: Sam...
translation.ja: その…

translation.en: we have hard evidence that someone broke into Pastiche's Facebook account
translation.ja: 何者かがパスティーシュの アカウントを乗っ取り

translation.en: and sent out an invite for the blackface party.
translation.ja: 黒人扮装パーティーの 招待状を

translation.en: Shit.
translation.ja: ウソでしょ

translation.en: My editor wants to run with the story as soon as possible, but...
translation.ja: うちの編集長は すぐ記事にしたいと

translation.en: if someone else breaks it before we do...
translation.ja: でも その前に 誰かが真実を話せば…

translation.en: You know?
translation.ja: 分かるだろ

translation.en: You'd ruin your own scoop?
translation.ja: スクープなのに

translation.en: I guess I just don't like the idea of telling someone else's truth.
translation.ja: 他人の秘密を暴くのは 好きじゃない

translation.en: Sam! I'm so glad you're here.
translation.ja: やあ よく来たね

translation.en: I just need you to leave immediately.
translation.ja: だけど すぐに出てってくれ

translation.en: What are you talking about? What's she doing here?
translation.ja: あの女 何してるの？

translation.en: Listen, I'm just filling your time slot with Dear Abigail until this whole blackface controversy blows over.
translation.ja: パーティーの騒動が 収まるまで彼女が代役を

translation.en: Dear Abigail?
translation.ja: アビゲイルが？

translation.en: I'm getting complaints from all over.
translation.ja: 苦情が殺到してて

translation.en: I've had trolls since day one.
translation.ja: 苦情は慣れっこよ

translation.en: Okay, people just don't get how you can have a show called Dear White People and then complain about a party called Dear Black People.
translation.ja: “親愛なる白人様”はよくて 黒人の仮装はダメなんて

translation.en: If I hear reverse racism one more time--
translation.ja: 逆差別だと…

translation.en: Reverse racism?
translation.ja: 逆差別ですって？

translation.en: - Really? - Yeah.
translation.ja: 逆差別ですって？ そう

translation.en: I get it. - You were just doing your job. - Thank you.
translation.ja: 分かった　仕事だものね

translation.en: Well, would you mind if I read some of the complaints?
translation.ja: 苦情を読ませてくれる？

translation.en: Sure, yeah, yeah. Come to my office.
translation.ja: もちろんさ　来て

translation.en: I could not believe there's so many racists on this campus. The more you know, right?
translation.ja: 学内に こんなに 差別主義者がいるなんてね

translation.en: I guess you know. You must get this all the time.
translation.ja: 君は知ってただろうけど…

translation.en: - Hey, hey! - ...a very bad roommate
translation.ja: おい ちょっと 最悪のルームメイトでね…

translation.en: my freshman year.
translation.ja: 最悪のルームメイトでね…

translation.en: - You? Out. - Okay.
translation.ja: 出てって 分かった

translation.en: - Yeah, excuse me. - Okay.
translation.ja: 悪いわね

translation.en: Dear white people, wow.
translation.ja: 親愛なる白人様

translation.en: Y'all really trying it.
translation.ja: やってくれたわね

translation.en: I get that being reduced to a race- based generalization
translation.ja: “白人”と 一括(ひとくく)りにされるのは嫌よね

translation.en: is a new and devastating experience for some of you,
translation.ja: “白人”と 一括(ひとくく)りにされるのは嫌よね でも 私たち黒人は 一括りにされてきた

translation.en: but here's the difference.
translation.ja: それにね

translation.en: My jokes don't incarcerate your youth at alarming rates
translation.ja: 私のジョークのせいで 誰かが投獄されたり―

translation.en: or make it unsafe for you to walk around your own neighborhoods.
translation.ja: 安心して近所を 歩けなくなったりはしない

translation.en: But yours do.
translation.ja: でも あなたたちが 黒人を蔑(さげす)むことは

translation.en: When you mock or belittle us,
translation.ja: でも あなたたちが 黒人を蔑(さげす)むことは 今の差別的なシステムを 強化する行為なの

translation.en: you enforce an existing system.
translation.ja: 今の差別的なシステムを 強化する行為なの

translation.en: Cops everywhere staring down the barrel of a gun at a Black man
translation.ja: 黒人に銃を向ける警官が 見ているのは―

translation.en: don't see a human being. They see a caricature...
translation.ja: 人ではなく 偏見に満ちた 風刺画よ

translation.en: a thug...
translation.ja: 凶悪で―

translation.en: A nigger. A nigger.
translation.ja: 危険な“ニガー”

translation.en: So... nah!
translation.ja: 冗談じゃないわ

translation.en: You don't get to show up in a Halloween costume version of us
translation.ja: ハロウィーンの仮装のノリで 黒人に扮して―

translation.en: and claim irony or ignorance,
translation.ja: 冗談にするなんて ひどい

translation.en: not anymore.
translation.ja: 許さないわ

translation.en: Before this party... a POC on this campus
translation.ja: 例のパーティーまでは 有色人種の学生たちが

translation.en: couldn't even think the word racism without being accused of crying wolf.
translation.ja: “差別された”って言ったら 周りに否定されてきた

translation.en: But just like it took a Sandra Bland,
translation.ja: でも留置場で亡くなった Ｓ(サンドラ)･ブランドや―

translation.en: a Trayvon Martin,
translation.ja: 射殺されたＴ(トレイボン)･マーティン

translation.en: and a Philando Castile to wake some folks up,
translation.ja: Ｐ(フィランド)･キャスティルが 気づかせてくれた

translation.en: this party is what it took to wake this campus up.
translation.ja: あのパーティーも 彼らと同じ役割を

translation.en: Look.
translation.ja: 実はね

translation.en: I sent the invite.
translation.ja: 招待状を送ったのは―

translation.en: I wrote it.
translation.ja: 私なの

translation.en: Broke into Pastiche's account and sent it.
translation.ja: パスティーシュの アカウントを使った

translation.en: It was fascinating to see what was lurking beneath the surface when you were given an excuse to suspend
translation.ja: リベラル派を気取る連中に 口実を与えたら

translation.en: your polite, passive liberalism.
translation.ja: 見事に本性を現してくれたわ

translation.en: I considered it a sociological experiment.
translation.ja: いわば社会学的な実験よ

translation.en: And guess what. You proved my point.
translation.ja: 結果は 私の思ったとおりだった

translation.en: Winchester, we got a problem.
translation.ja: ウィンチェスターは 問題を抱えてる

translation.en: Oh, one more thing.
translation.ja: それと もう１つ

translation.en: To Gabe Mitchell, I'm sorry.
translation.ja: ゲイブ･ミッチェルに謝るわ

translation.en: Please forgive me.
translation.ja: ごめんなさい

translation.en: #HateItWhen bae's mad.
translation.ja: ＃怒らないでベイビー

translation.en: - I should say that to my roommate? -
translation.ja: ルームメイトに伝えるべき？

translation.en: All she did was leave a wet towel on my bed.
translation.ja: 濡れタオルを ベッドに置くなって 〝何てこと？〞 〝よく言った〞 濡れタオルを ベッドに置くなって

translation.en: You know, I'll try it.
translation.ja: 〝ブラボー〞 〝ブラボー〞 言ってみるわ　ありがとう 言ってみるわ　ありがとう ゲイブから 〝君を抱きたい〞 言ってみるわ　ありがとう

translation.en: - Thanks, Abigail. -
translation.ja: ゲイブから 〝君を抱きたい〞 言ってみるわ　ありがとう ゲイブから 〝君を抱きたい〞
